headline: Two injured in stabbing near downtown Columbus
author: Daniel Griffin
sentences: COLUMBUS, Ohio (WCMH) â€” Two people were hospitalized after a stabbing near the downtown area of Columbus Tuesday afternoon.
One victim was taken to Grant Medical Center in critical condition, while a second was taken in stable condition.
Columbus police said the stabbing happened on the 700 block of South 22nd Street.
No further information is available at this time.
